txt.en:
'Thank you for your efforts in assisting us here at Twickenburg, [placeholder]. I am in your debt.

'I have heard troubling news from Floodwend, a settlement to our south; Orcs and other enemies have begun harassing them.

'There you will find the young Thane Radwig, who has recently lost his father. His mother Etta counsels him. Any assistance you give them will be welcome, I am sure.'

'Ah! A travelling warrior! Such interesting folk rarely grace our town.\n\n'It was good of Tidlac to send you, for you have come at just the right time. Floodwend has enemies on almost every side, and we have not received supplies or traders from Harwick or the Norcrofts in several weeks.'
The settlements of the Wold have been unable to use the roads for trade or communication, which is dangerous for all people who live there.
The city of Floodwend is in the south-eastern part of the Wold, but the road is said to be treacherous.\n\nYou should travel to the Wold and search for the Thane there.
